main event: A sighting of a reddish-brown object disappearing into haze in the horizontal plane to the east on 17 Nov 1961.
interesting points: The object exhibited rapid movement and instantaneous disappearance., The object was too bright to distinguish its shape., The object left a bright trail lasting approximately 5 seconds., There was no sound heard by the first observer, although a second observer reported an explosion sound., The sighting was observed by a married couple aged approximately 57 years.
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. aged approximately 57 years, good reliability.
